meta.description: Join us to celebrate our special day

timeline.title: First Meeting
timeline.description: Work brought us together, a corporate party brought us closer, and the feeling that we were made for each other appeared immediately.

timeline.title: Growing Closer
timeline.description: Shared views, sense of humor and warmth of soul - everything came together. We quickly realized that there was something more between us than just sympathy.

timeline.title: The Proposal
timeline.description: It was that very moment when words are almost unnecessary. We just knew we wanted everything together.

registry.title: Gentle Accents
registry.subtitle:
We deeply appreciate your attention and care. But we ask you not to bring flowers - it will be difficult for us to preserve them after the celebration.

If you want to leave a warm memory - a book, wine or lottery ticket would be especially pleasant for us.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our big day

questions.question: What should I wear?
questions.answer: We don't have a strict dress code - come in what is comfortable and beautiful for you. We will be happy with any looks, but please try to avoid particularly bright colors such as red and green.

questions.question: Is parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, there is free parking at the event venue.

questions.question: Can I bring a plus one?
questions.answer: Yes, of course - just let us know in advance so we can take everything into account.

questions.question: Will the ceremony be indoors or outdoors?
questions.answer: The ceremony is planned outdoors, weather permitting. In case of rain, we will move to a tent where the event itself will take place.

questions.question: How to get from Burlacheny village to the event venue?
questions.answer: For your convenience, a transfer will be organized - a bus will deliver guests to the venue and take them back. If you prefer to get there yourself, you can come by personal car.
